code: import{ADD_EXPENSES_REQUEST,ADD_EXPENSES_SUCCESS,ADD_EXPENSES_FAIL,GET_BILL_FAIL,GET_BILL_REQUEST,GET_BILL_sUCCESS}from'../constants/expenses_constants';export var addExpensesReducer=function addExpensesReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_EXPENSES_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ADD_EXPENSES_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,success:true,expenses:action.payload};case ADD_EXPENSES_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var getBillReducer=function getBillReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_BILL_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case GET_BILL_sUCCESS:return{loading:false,success:true,expenses:action.payload};case GET_BILL_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};
